Help & Support

FAQ’s

Check answers to the most common questions about ChargeAutomation

What is a security deposit?

Security deposit is collected in a form of authorization (hold). The maximum holding period for Stripe users is 28 days for Visa and 30 days for Discover/MasterCard/Amex or 7 days for other cards.

Once a booking ended, the Security deposit is automatically released 3 days after check out.

How can I collect security deposit with ChargeAutomation?

In ChargeAutomation, there are 3 ways of collecting security deposit

  1. By manually sending authorization request link to your customer.

  2. By creating a re-usable authorization link and sharing it to anyone.

  3. By creating auto payment rule for automatic collection. 

How safe it is to use ChargeAutomation for damage deposits?

Our superior detection eliminates fraudulent chargebacks entirely. Zero fraud guaranteed.

Which short-term rental companies use security deposit software?

Short-term rental companies that use upselling software from ChargeAutomation include CozySuites, PMI, UpStay & Carzi Contactless and many more.

Can authorization rules be customized?

You can define rules, schedule dates and the amount of security deposit authorization for each property or booking channel. 

How do I capture funds with security deposit authorization?

If you detect any damage to the property once the guest has left, you may opt to capture funds from the security deposit authorization. This can be initiated directly through ChargeAutomation. 

You can capture the whole amount or a partial amount and leave a brief description for your records.

Is the security deposit returned automatically?

Security deposit authorizations are automatically returned 3 days after check out.

What if the guest doesn't provide payment details or if ChargeAutomation can't take full payment?

ChargeAutomation will continue to send automatic notifications to the guest, reminding them of the requirement to provide valid credit card details.

Is data collected protected?

ChargeAutomation is GDPR and PCI-compliant solution. Personal data security is the cornerstone of our operations.

What are the transaction fees for the security deposit authorization?

With security deposit authorizations by ChargeAutomation you save on processing fees from your payment gateway. Only a fraction of those fees for using ChargeAutomation’s security deposit software.
